channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft SharePoint
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft SharePoint

item.title: CVE-2018-0916|2024-08-05T03:44:11.599Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20sharepoint
item.description: Microsoft Project Server 2013 SP1 and Microsoft SharePoint Enterprise Server 2016 allow an elevation of privilege vulnerability to due how specially crafted web requests are sanitized, aka "Microsoft SharePoint Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability". This CVE is unique from CVE-2018-0909, CVE-2018-0910. CVE-2018-0911, CVE-2018-0912, CVE-2018-0913 CVE-2018-0914, CVE-2018-0915, CVE-2018-0917, CVE-2018-0921, CVE-2018-0923, CVE-2018-0944 and CVE-2018-0947.

item.title: CVE-2018-0790|2024-08-05T03:35:49.354Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20sharepoint
item.description: Microsoft SharePoint Foundation 2010, Microsoft SharePoint Server 2013 and Microsoft SharePoint Server 2016 allow an elevation of privilege vulnerability due to the way web requests are handled, aka "Microsoft SharePoint Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability". This CVE is unique from CVE-2018-0789.
